text:
These two stars only for quality doctor and cleanliness. But management of the hospital is worst, price is very high according to service. For better and affordable service you can choose KIIMS, where you can find doctors round the clock.
Some basic differences between Utkal and KIIMS is below:-
1. During admit a patient Utkal hospital conduct Rapid Antigen test which costs you 700 rupees as well as RTPCR test which costs you 2800 rupees. They don't allow the govt test reports. Where as KIIMS allow the same but in case you don't have COVID report  you can test RTPCR in a price of 400 rupees only.

2. NICU charge of Utkal is 5500 rupees where as in KIIMS it costs you 2000

3. Utkal hospital doesn't provide any discount in medicine bill or don't allow to purchase medicine from outside where as in KIIMS you get 10% discount in every medicine as well as they allow you to purchase from outside.

Intresting thing is before admission Utkal hospital counciling staffs differentiate between Utkal and KIIMS like a manner that there hospital is doing the same what KIIMS does, but that's totally false.

ଏହି ଦୁଇ ତାରକା କେବଳ ଗୁଣାତ୍ମକ ଡାକ୍ତର ଏବଂ ପରିଷ୍କାର ପରିଚ୍ଛନ୍ନତା ପାଇଁ | କିନ୍ତୁ ଡାକ୍ତରଖାନାର ପରିଚାଳନା ସବୁଠାରୁ ଖରାପ, ସେବା ଅନୁଯାୟୀ ମୂଲ୍ୟ ବହୁତ ଅଧିକ | ଉନ୍ନତ ଏବଂ ସୁଲଭ ସେବା ପାଇଁ ଆପଣ KIIMS ଚୟନ କରିପାରିବେ, ଯେଉଁଠାରେ ଆପଣ ଡାକ୍ତରମାନଙ୍କୁ ଘଣ୍ଟା ଘଣ୍ଟା ପାଇପାରିବେ |

Utkal ଏବଂ KIIMS ମଧ୍ୟରେ କିଛି ମ basic ଳିକ ପାର୍ଥକ୍ୟ ନିମ୍ନରେ ଅଛି: -
1. ଜଣେ ରୋଗୀଙ୍କୁ ସ୍ୱୀକାର କରିବା ସମୟରେ ଉତ୍କଳ ହସ୍ପିଟାଲ୍ ରାପିଡ୍ ଆଣ୍ଟିଜେନ୍ ପରୀକ୍ଷା କରେ ଯାହାର ମୂଲ୍ୟ 700 ଟଙ୍କା ଏବଂ RTPCR ପରୀକ୍ଷା ଯାହାର ମୂଲ୍ୟ 2800 ଟଙ୍କା | ସେମାନେ ସରକାରୀ ପରୀକ୍ଷା ରିପୋର୍ଟକୁ ଅନୁମତି ଦିଅନ୍ତି ନାହିଁ | କିନ୍ତୁ KIIMS ସମାନ ଜିନିଷ ପାଇଁ ଅନୁମତି ଦିଏ କିନ୍ତୁ ଯଦି ଆପଣଙ୍କର COVID ରିପୋର୍ଟ ନଥାଏ ତେବେ ଆପଣ କେବଳ 400 ଟଙ୍କା ମୂଲ୍ୟରେ RTPCR ପରୀକ୍ଷା କରିପାରିବେ |

2. ଉତ୍କଳର NICU ଚାର୍ଜ ହେଉଛି 5500 ଟଙ୍କା ଯେଉଁଠାରେ KIIMS ରେ ଏହା ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ 2000 ଖର୍ଚ୍ଚ ଆସେ |

3. ଉତ୍କଳ ଡାକ୍ତରଖାନା ମେଡିସିନ୍ ବିଲରେ  discount କୌଣସି ରିହାତି ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ ନାହିଁ କିମ୍ବା ବାହାରେ medicine କିଣିବାକୁ ଅନୁମତି ଦିଏ ନାହିଁ ଯେଉଁଠାରେ KIIMS ରେ ଆପଣ ପ୍ରତ୍ୟେକ medicine ଷଧରେ 10% ରିହାତି ପାଇବେ ଏବଂ ସେମାନେ ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ବାହାରେ କିଣିବାକୁ ମଧ୍ୟ ଅନୁମତି ଦେବେ |

* ଚିତ୍ତାକର୍ଷକ ବିଷୟ ହେଉଛି Admission ପୂର୍ବରୁ ଉତ୍କଳ ହସ୍ପିଟାଲ୍ କାଉନସିଲ୍ କର୍ମଚାରୀମାନେ ଉତ୍କଳ ଏବଂ KIIMS ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଭିନ୍ନ କରନ୍ତି ଯେପରି କି ଡାକ୍ତରଖାନା KIIMS ଯାହା କରେ ତାହା ସମାନ, କିନ୍ତୁ ତାହା ସମ୍ପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ମିଥ୍ୟା |

text:
Kalinga Hospital is again a third-rate hospital in Bhubaneswar. It's okay only for minor operations for which you get corporate referrals/ funding (if you are a PSU employee) and reimbursement if you have health insurance plans. But there is lot of harassment and wastage of time there. The doctors hardly visit the wards and advise over phone only. In most cases, they never come at all. Worse, the junior doctors (except Dr. Lipee Murmu and a few others), nurses and para-medical staff are grossly incompetent to attend the patients and handle the cases. They can carry out mindless rituals only, like forcibly waking up a patient at 6 pm and giving medicines even when the patient is fast asleep. They are only concerned about finishing their duties and while away rest of the time. There is inordinate delay in everything, even for a glass of water or milk for patients who are on liquid diet. They provide frugal meals but will take away the trays within 10 mins whether you eat or not. The staff partake the meals among themselves. Most of the patients go hungry and the staff don't care about it. Some nurses are ill-mannered and incompetent. They don't even know how to dismantle the support rails of the beds. They don't care to check when the saline is going empty and you have to call them again and again in panic.

The actual doctors who handle the case never turn up. Their third-line assistants come on their behalf after frantic calling. Most of the patients lie in a neglected state. Therefore, most death cases are reported from this hospital. Most of the doctors have a totally indifferent attitude because the are attached with other hospitals and clinics. Notably, psychiatrist Dr. Jayprakash Russel Ravan whose behaviour is too rude, disappointing and shocking. The administration should take note of it. He'll never respond and you'll be forced to leave the hospital for good. He operates over phone only which this is not desirable in psychiatric cases. But when you call him up for some important advice, he'll never respond. He doesn't know the code of conduct and starts talking like a vegetable vendor when you seek advice on how to continue with a prescription. Kalinga Hospital, which claims "Compassionate Care for All" should avoid deploying such careless doctors in order to save its reputation. The worst victims of this hospital are those who get admitted in the wards for minor operations sponsored by corporate hoses. This hospital is grossly incompetent to handle any other cases. Many patients have narrated their nightmarish experience in this hospital including death of their kith and kin due to negligence.
name: Bibhu Prasad Satapathy
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: ଆଗରୁ  English ରେ ଲେଖିଥିଲି ଏବେ ଓଡ଼ିଆ ରେ ଲେଖୁଛି। ଦୟା କରି ଯଦି ମରିବା ପାଇଁ chahuncha ସେହି hospital କୁ ଯା। ମୁଁ patient କଥା କହୁଚି ତାଙ୍କର disease ଯେଉଁ ଜାଗା ରେ ସେଇଟା operation ହେଇନି। କିନ୍ତୁ ପଇସା ନେଇଗଲେ। ପୁଣି disease return ହେଲା କହିଲେ infection।puni biospy ପାଇଁ କାଟିଦେଲେ ଆଉ ଷ୍ଟିଚ ବି କଲେନି। ପଇସା ପାଇଁ ଏତେ ତଳକୁ ଖସି ଯାଉଛନ୍ତି।ଡ୍ର Rajesh padhi apananku operation ଆସିନି jadi patient ଙ୍କୁ ମାରନ୍ତୁନି। ଯଦି ସେହି doctor ଙ୍କ ନିଜ ଲୋକ କିଏ ହେଇଥାନ୍ତା ସେ ସେମିତି କରିଥାନ୍ତେ କି ?ଭଗବାନ ବି sahibeni। ତେଣୁ ମୁଁ specially ଓଡ଼ିଶା ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ କହୁଛି ନିଜ ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ ମାରିବାକୁ ହେଲେ ସେହି hospital କୁ ଯାଆନ୍ତୁ । ନହେଲେ hospital dwara madantuni

text: Today i.e., on 18.8.22 at 10.30 am, I visited this hospital to consult medicine specialist as OPD and deposited 500/- at 10.35 am on learning that the concerned doctor is on rounds since 10.00 am. Posted for public awareness.

text: This hospital is a death trap! I would never wish upon anyone to end up there even if they were lost! The doctors are just interested in sucking your money dry without caring if the patients live or die. The nurses are pretty low on abilities and skill but very high on attitude...they are better suited to butcher shops..I had this unfortunate luck that my father was admitted to this hell hole for UTI(supposedly so) where one Dr.Manas Pradhan(uro) was his doc. Firstly this doc was such a big VIP that he rarely came to visit the patient and even worse he considers it against his principles to explain the patient's condition to us. Another friend of his Dr Sai Kumar Sahoo(nephro) is expert at scaring you with life or death consequences so that you give in to expensive unnecessary procedures...and that's how they suck you dry, mind you at the cost of your patient's health. Once they are through sucking you they will simply say we cant do anything and you can go from here. Dialysis is a business there and people are stuffed like cattle one after the other for it. You are more likely to get more infections in that place than be cured of some. They even stopped medications immediately for my dad when his conditions was deteriorating because we had initiated discharge procedure. We were lucky to get out of that hospital in time. If you value your near and dear ones stay away from there.
name: Siddharth Behera
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text:
Advantage very good and variety type of test available here blood urine ECG MRI X Ray all kinds of tiretmet available here radiology test buy certified doctors doctor and nurse are very good behaviour inside a Pharmacy for immediately medicine connected and who can easily treatment here their place is very good neat and clean and healthy and hygienic canteen available here and lots of parking have the parking is safe working area and ATM available in their campus for immediately you can collect money and copies of hair canteens airports every for a very tasty and healthy hygienic OLX force are vegetariansone of the pioneers of a state of the art Multi Super Specialty Hospital committed to provide compassionate care to the people of Odisha and adjoining region. Set up by a visionary philanthropic group of 54 NRIs under the name of Hospital Corporation of Orissa (HCO), a Company registered in USA; the Hospital has been registered under companies Act 1956 on 02.05.1990. Since commencement in 1990, the hospital has been serving the community by delivering preventive, curative and rehabilitative services to the patients from all the economic and social strata.

With 250 beds and the spectrum of other services, the hospital still serves as the most comprehensive, affordable and dependable health care institution to the community. Clinical Finesse, Sincere Service, Dedicated People, Affordable Price and Unmatched Quality are the five pillars of the hospital. Situated at a strategic location in the city it is well connected with railway station (8KM), airport (14KM) and national highway (5KM). Build up of 10 acres of picturesque landscape, the ambience conjures up images of hope and happiness.

As an ISO 9001- 2008 institution for rendering Multi Super Specialty Health Care Services, KHL had also been declared as a referral hospital of first choice for treatment of Government servant and their families, by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Govt. of Orissa. Last but definitely not the least; KHL is a certified centre to perform Kidney Transplantation from Directorate of Medical Education and Training
name: Papu Karan
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: One of the best hospital in Bhubaneswar
name: Abhinav Topno
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: Promoted by a group of Odia NRIs Kalinga Hospital was opened in 1990 as a first super speciality Hospital in Bhubaneswar where health care facilities was very poor till the year 1990.Except for Capital Hospital there was no hospital worth the name for critical illness & such patients were taken to SCB Medical College where patients care was utterly negligent. The opening of this 250 be deducted hospital paved the way for other big private hospitals in Bhubaneswar. But sadly due to poor management Kalinga Hospital was not able to live upto the initial promise. Now it is not the hospital of first choice. The hospital to say the least is no longer hospitable.
name: GouriShankar Panda
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: I was in Bhubneshwar as a tourist, had a severe headache (happened earlier also). Since Kalinga was closest hospital to my hotel I mov there and told doctor about my problem and also told doctor that I take voveran injection in this situation. He refused to give me that and asked to pay around Rs 500 as fees for investigations inspite of my telling him that I have a flight in the morning and won't be able to come again to him, I just want him to give me the injection. But he still insisted on same. Finally I moved out in pain to a local dispensary  who gave me the injection which relieved the unbearable pain.
name: Ninja Tango (Nov Tan)
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: DrB Nahak and team was excellent. Good Hospitality.
name: Nirmal Maji
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: Actually hospital has many good doctors but they are not good at service. They are giving treatment on business purpose only.. which may be bad for patients with serious conditions
name: Priyabrata Sahoo (Silu)
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: Sharing my personal experience...I underwent acl surgery ...but the doctors know u until the surgery...and once you pay the money it's over....highly qualified but unprofessional in behaviour...and don't forget to carry atleast a lakh if ur having any surgery...highly overpriced..once you enter the hospital they will loot your money for even breathing the air ..my suggestion is not to go there because Odisha and India have many better hospitals...
name: Abhishek Das
title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text: Very poor healthcare service. Taking money like multi-specialty Pvt. hospital but providing service like Govt. hospitals.For a simple discharge only it took 6hr 30mins yesterday, what else I can say !! Poor..

text: ମୋ ମାଆ ହାର୍ଟ ରୋଗରେ ପୀଡିତ ଥିଲେ କିନ୍ତୁ ଆମେ ଜାଣି ନଥିଲୁ।କିନ୍ତୁ ମୋ ମାଆ କାମ କଲେ ଧଇଁସଇଁ ହେଇଯାଉ ଥିଲା ।ଆମେ ଭାବିଲୁ କି ମାଙ୍କର ଶ୍ୱାସ ରୋଗ ଅଛି ବୋଲି କିନ୍ତୁ ଶ୍ୱାସ ଔଷଧ ଖାଇଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଦେହ ଭଲ ହେଉନଥିଲା ଆଉ ତାପରେ ଆମେ ସ୍ୱେତାଙ୍କ ସାର ଙ୍କୁ ପରାମର୍ଶ କଲୁ ।ସେ କହିଲେ କି ମୋ ମାଆ ଙ୍କ ହାର୍ଟ ରେ ଏକ ମାଂସ ବଢ଼ିଛି।ସାର କହିଲେ କି ଏହାର ଅପରେସନ କରିବାକୁ ପଡ଼ିବ। ତାପରେ ଆମେ ଅପରେସନ ପାଇଁ ଆଗେଇଲୁ ଆଉ ମଧ୍ୟ ଭଗବାନ ଙ୍କ ଦୟାରୁ ଅପରେସନ ସଫଳ ହେଲା।ଆମେ ବହୁତ ଖୁସି ଅନୁଭବ କଲୁ।ଯାହା ହେଉ ଶ୍ୱେତାଙ୍ଗ ସାର ଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଆମେ ଆମ ମା ଙ୍କୁ ଫେରି ପାଇଲୁ।swetanka ସାର ଙ୍କୁ ଧନ୍ୟବାଦ୍ ଜଣେଇଲୁ।
name: Badal Behera
title: Sunshine Hospital

text: मेरी जिंदगी का सबसे बुरा अनुभव अपोलो हास्पिटल भुबनेश्वर के इमरजेंसी में जाकर हुआ, आज 14.07 को लगभग 12:40  बजे इमरजेंसी गेट पर गया, पहले तो 10से 15 मिनट तक तो बाहर लाइन लगाया वो भी टैब जब मेरा मरीज बैठने के हालात में नही था, फिर एक महान डॉक्टर जी आये, जो इमरजेंसी का अगर कोई उल्टा है तो वहां इन्हें होना चाहिए, में उनका नाम नही लिखना चाहूंगा क्योंकी डाक्टर इस धरती का भगवान है, और वो भगवान का बिल्कुल उल्टा भगवान....में अनुरोध किया कि मेरे मरीज को एडमिट कर लीजिये, private, semi , general , किसी भी वार्ड में , मगर उनके अनुसार अपोलो में एडमिट करने का प्रोसेस बहुत लंबा है , पहले जानना होगा कि बीमारी क्या है, तो मैंने कोविद निगेटिव, और कई सारे ब्लड रिपोर्ट दिखाया जिसमे यूरिन इन्फेक्शन था, ये सारे रिपोर्ट 13.07 का था, इसपे हास्पिटल managment को ध्यान देना चाहिए, अंत मे में मेरे मरीज को लेकर 01.15 बजे चला गया...
name: Manoj kumar Yadav

text: ଏଠି ଟ୍ରିଟମେଣ୍ଟ ନୁହେଁ ବରଂ ଧନ୍ଦା କରୁଛନ୍ତି ଜିବନ କୁ ନେଇ।ମୋ ମାମୁଁ ଙ୍କୁ ମାରିଦେଲେ😭😭😭। ସବୁ ବେ*ଛୁଆ ବା* ଲୋକ ଏଠି। ୫ ଲକ୍ଷ ନେଇଗଲେ ଆଉ ମାମୁଁ ଙ୍କୁ ମାରିଦେଲେ। All Staff and sequrity guards ବେ*ଛୁଆ ଛୁଆ ସବୁ ଶଳା। ଆମ ପଈସା ସବୁ ସରିଲା ପରେ MLA ଙ୍କ ପାଖକୁ ଯାଇଥିଲୁ ସେ owner ଙ୍କ ପାଖକୁ call ସବୁ shoutout କରି ଦେଇଥିଲେ ଆଉ କିଛି ପଇସା ଲାଗି ନଥାନ୍ତା । କିନ୍ତୁ ସେ ବାଳ MD and staff ତା next day ୪dec ଦିନ ସନ୍ଧ୍ୟା ୬ ଟା time re କହିଲେ ତମ patient ମରି ଯାଉଛନ୍ତି । 😭😭 Operation ପରେ ୧୦ ଦିନ ଆଇସିୟୁ ରଖିଥିଲେ ventilator ଲଗେଇ ଥିଲେ ସବୁ ପଉସା ନେଲେ ଯେମିତି ଆଉ ପଉସା ୠ ବାଟ ବନ୍ଧ ହେଇଗଲା ତାଙ୍କୁ ମରିଦେଲେ । Operation ବି successful ନଥିଲା କହିଲେ । ମ ସିନା କିଛି କରି ପାରିବିନି କିନ୍ତୁ ଜନେ ସବୁ ଦେଖୁଚି ମୋର ଯେମିତି ହେଈଚି ତମ ୠ ସେମିତି ହବ।

title: Kalinga Hospital Ltd.

text:
AMRI Hospital is only for rich people and for the people who have lots of money.

As per personal experience AMRI main focus is on billing not on patient health conditions.

Regarding behaviour of medical staff, staff behaviour is very rude and their is no humanity within them.

Those who love their parents so much and if they are in critical health condition,never prefer this hospital as First Priority

Hope things will change in coming days so that other can have the good experiences.

Mmeri mother ko urgent treatment ki jarurat thi fir bhi formality pura karne m time lagaye, fir bolte hai ki hum pehle covid test karenge uske baad decide karenge ki admit karna hai ya nahi . Jab ki hamara refer case tha Vikash bargarh hospital se refer kiya gaya tha. Meri mother 9 hrs travel karke gai thi critical condition mein, waha jane k baad covid positive nikla to night k 10 baje bolte hai ki aap dusre hospital leke jaiye. We are not a local , uss time mujhe or meri family ko kuchh samajh nahi aa raha tha ki kya kare, kaha leke jaye. Amri hospital wale option bhi nahi bataye ki hum kaha leke jaa sakte hai ! Management se bhi baat nahi karne diye or na hi management hamari kisi tarah se koi help kiya. Jab MCL hospital(BRJN)ke CMO pata kiye orhume govt hospital jane k liye bole.Jis time hum apni mother ambulance m shift karne k liye bole to hame strecharko bahar le jane k liye mana kar diya gayagaya. Humne 108 ko call kiya tha wo Amri hospital k andar jane se mana kar diya b'coz 108 Ambulance kisi bhi private property k andar nahi jaa sakta. Amri walon ne humanity bhi nahi dikhai, mere bhaiya ne apni hathon m utha k maa ko 108 Ambulance m rakhe. Amri wale ne meri mother ko shift tak nahi kiya. MCL employee hone k baad humko itna kuchh face karna pada to normal logo k sath ye log kya karte honge. ! Sirf badi bulding bana lene se koi achha hospital nahi ban jata. Management should   do their duties properly. Mai to Amri m kabhi nahi jaungi or na hi kisi ko suggest karungi. Rating m 0 star nahi de paa rahi hu isliye 1 star dena pada taki apna experience share kar saku or review de pau.Emergency department sahi behave nahi karta hai.
Thank u🙏

Hope things will change in coming days so that other can have the good experiences.

Thank You

text:
One of the worst experiences ever had this is not a hospital this is a joke this is more of a ram bharose hospital rather than multi expert they have used some old gym still it has label trademill on top the doctors are not available all the examination ecg xray done by some old guy who is not any expert or anything more of errand boy and local aunties , the machines are in pathetic situation hospital beds are standing  after multiple welding xray machine and ecg machine are begging to be cleaned and replace as of sanity is concerned they don't even have hand wash in bathroom.
All they care about bill how much bill they have to generate before test they are concerned about how much bill they should prepare they don't ask for what diagnosis to run but the bill to generate. You can understand the mindset of people and the most terrifying thing is this kind of mentality in health care . Feeling sorry for everyone visiting there as they don't care how long patients are waiting they will come around 12 only. Please avoid these kind of hospital
name: Leon Pease
title: Usthi Hospital & Research Centre

text: Best doctors with amazing nursing staffs... Counseling is superb.  My insurance  covered with complete cashless facility.. I had not to give any extra cash even though I get a deduction on the  bill amount.

text:
Despite bad reviews I went there for my wife's septoplasty surgery , to my surprise experience was better than Apollo hospital where I had done my surgery few months back.

The doctors and nurses are very cooperative and friendly..even other staffs like Mr Sunil from billing department really helped me a lot for the cashless claim process, literally I had to sign in few forms and he filled all other details .. the total bill was around 47k only whereas in Apollo for the same surgery it was whooping 2L !

Coming to the rooms it was well maintained, clean even better than Apollo.

Maybe hospital services were not good in the past but my experience was really good.. I would to thank my doctor Dr Bulu nahak , because of him the surgery went smooth!🙏

Only con is CT scan is not available in the hospital, you need to visit some other lab for the same ,however despite the rush in the lab there doctor helped to expedite the scanning process..wish it was in-house but the staff politely explained addition of those will cost 5L+ per month which is not profitable for them which I understand completely..I liked their honesty in this matter 🙂

I suggest hospital to improve below things-
Provide handwash,towel and geyser in washroom.
Need to provide a more wider bed for attendant.

Overall thank you all staffs!

Final point while Apollo staffs forced to rate the hospital 5 star but usthi didn't ask anything.
name: SHEIKH AZHARUDDIN
title: Usthi Hospital & Research Centre

text:
To call it a hospital is a blemish on the healthcare industry.

I got admitted here only because of doctor and insurance company’s preference.

The staff are as pleasant as any government hospital staff with only worse knowledge and demeanour.

I got my first shock when they said they’ll not give me a towel in the private AC room that was booked for me.

But the biggest shock came when they refused to give me water when I requested for some. And to top that the nurse Gitanjali misbehaved with me.

Worst ever experience. Avoid it like the plague.

text: Worst hospital in Bhubaneswar. Hospitals staffs and Doctors behave very badly with the patients who have revisited the hospital to show the reports. They treat patients who pay them instantly. More over a hospital staff says our phones are out of service so a patient can reach them he has to directly go to the hospital in order to get the treatment. Don't ever visit Usthi at all. Even govt. hospitals or block level hospitals will treat you better and you will get well soon. This is a honest feedback from my end. Hope this will save many lives.
name: Rajesh Patnaik
title: Usthi Hospital & Research Centre

text:
If you are looking for a quick review, I would say visit this hospital only if u have deep pockets. It's expensive. If u are admitted, they will drain ur pockets sooner than your phone's battery.

We visited this hospital on 1st Nov,2021 and got my sister admitted for 3 days. U have to pay an upfront advance of 5k for admission which will used be for doctor, nurse services and bed charges only. For medicines and tests, u have to pay separately. The bed charges are okay. ₹1000 for general ward and ₹2500 for a private room which also includes food for patient.

The doctors over here are decent as well but it's expensive in my opinion. There were numerous tests which may have been necessary for diagnosis but every single test is overpriced. The RT-PCR test in KIMS is for ₹400 and u get the result in the same day. The same test here in Usthi is for ₹1000 and we didn't get the result that soon as well. A simple antigen test costs ₹500 which is more than RT-PCR in other hospitals. I will attach the receipts of other tests as well for reference. For a 3 day hospitalisation, we spent around ₹13-14k on tests alone, 8k on admission charges and 3-4k on medicines. Around 25k and the diagnosis was urine infection and calcium deficiency. Not that I wanted my sister to have more diseases but 25k for this is a lot.

They have their own pharmacy where the medicines are sold at MRP and  there is absolutely no discount even though u are buying everything from there.  All of that is still fine but they charge ₹600 for nurse services and ₹800 for doctor consultation every day. ₹600 and ₹800 for an in-patient consultation. This is bizzare. That means if u stay for one day in general ward and don't buy medicines and do tests, u still have to pay ₹2400.

On top of all of this, we had to fight with the management because, they charged the bed for 3 days and doctor consultation for 4 days. Thankfully they refunded us the extra ₹800 deducted as discount. The doctors are decent, the nurses are helpful and the hospital is also kept clean but I'm not visiting this hospital again because it's not affordable. I would rather visit SUM or KIMS. We regularly visit SUM hospital and the expenses are way less.
name: Ronit Khatua
title: Usthi Hospital & Research Centre

text:
Very bad experience on Blood test report. On 6th Aug 2017 ,I called usthi hospital to collect blood sample of my parents for some of test including Blood sugar. Though my parents were suffering from blood sugar it was under 150 ( fasting ) and the same result was coming in digital glucometer , suddenly I got a report that the fasting blood sugar of my father is 242, I was much worried. Finding no other way in 7th Aug 2017,I did the test in another lab and as expected the result became less than 150.
I wrote a email to usthi hospital mentioning that there is a problem in their report and attached all the reports, as I got different measurement in another lab and digital glucometer..... After couple of hours I got a call from the hospital who mentioned that glucometer reading might be wrong and other lab report might be wrong ... They r doing correct test :) , They took Rs 1450 for all the tests and I will have to do it again... Never relay on usthi LAB Report and when I m trying to see other Google reviews and I can easily identify those given starts r paid ratings only...
name: Asitkumar Mallik
title: Usthi Hospital & Research Centre
